segments.text: Bill , how can you hear so happy today ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Aha . I've read of my roommate . I made a move today .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Brain Locker ? No , I don't think so . What does he look like ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , he's thin and tall . He has brown hair , a holt nose , green eyes and wearing glasses .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Mm . I've seen him a couple of times , I think .
segments.speaker: S1
